overview: "The Driver" - Johnny the limo driver has caught the attention of rich wives, Alexis and Audrey. As their husbands talk business, the wives are fucking the limo driver.  "Sl--p It Off" -Johnny's friend is letting him crash at his place. When his friend starts being mean to his wife, Johnny steps in to protect her. She pays him back with her big tits.  "I Am Desirable" - Jenna is out to get even with her asshole husband. He tells her no man would want her. To prove him wrong, Jenna fucks every guy she meets.  "I Want Cock Now!" - Kortney's husband has been working very hard and they are leaving for vacation soon. Luckily for him, she can't wait. She fucks him nice and hard.  "Swappers" - Mason and Jordan like swapping partners. They find Phoenix and her husband and f-rce them to swap spouses.
title: Real Wife Stories 9
